page.title: 19A CAPTAIN LIVING IN CRADLEY
page.content: Many people who live in Cradley travel the world to carry out their work; one resident is Captain of a cargo ship.He loves Cradley and would never leave but he only spends one third of his time here.The rest he is away at sea. His voyage starts at Liverpool where his first job is to check everything on the boat.He asks the engineer about the engine.Then there is the oil-is there enough in the tank for the journey? Next he looks at the cargo to see it is packed properly because it is coming up to hurricane season.Then he checks the navigation and lastly he checks the crew to see that everybody is there.When they set sail they go to the West Indies by crossing the Atlantic.After they have unloaded they go up the River Amazon to load 3,000 tons of plywood and Brazil nuts and mahogany wood.
